name: Ilulissat Water Taxi - Coolest Taxi On Earth
name_original: Ilulissat Water Taxi - Coolest Taxi On Earth
description:
*************************************
The International Academy of Visual Arts
2016 Davey Award SILVER WINNER
*************************************

Be the Captain on Earths Coolest Taxi, Ilulissat Water Taxi.

Sail around in the sea filled with ice, boats, whales and other objects.
Your mission is simple, but hard to master: Sail your water taxi and don't hit anything and collect coins to beat your friends with your score.
Remember some of the whales are submerged and you can sail above those.

Are you interested in the real Ilulissat Water Taxi?
Then you can visit their website: http://ilulissatwatertaxi.com/ - where you can watch great video from the real sailing.
